page.title: 06A MAY DAY IN CHALFORD
page.content: One May morning at a quarter to six l went for a May Walk,with my mother and brother Pierre.We went with my mum's friends from near the barleyfield.We walked though the woods and ended up at Oakridge and then came back home. In the afternoon we had visitors,they stayed for dinner,after dinner we went to the Village Fete.I had a go in the maze and on a trick bike,when you turn right it goes left and when you turn left it goes right.I had a go on the death slide across the river,and entered the bike competition.Then I had an ice_cream before I went home. Years ago all the young people in the village used to go on May Walks to collect flowers and leaves to celebrate the coming of summer.
